required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study on the Safety of SAFIL® MESH
clinical_study.official_title: Observational, Retrospective, Multi-center Clinical Study on the Safety of SAFIL® MESH in Patients Undergoing Reinforcement of Soft Tissues After Abdominal Wall Surgery or Other Fascial Defects

brief_summary.textblock: The study design is a retrospective case-note series of patients that have undergone reinforcement of soft tissues with Safil® Mesh after abdominal wall surgery or other fascial defects between the period January 2019 - November 2020 at Hospital Galdakao-Usansolo.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at one follow-up 12-30 months after initial intervention
primary_outcome.description: Rate of hernias occuring during follow-up of retrospectively included patients

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at one follow-up 12-30 months after initial intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Complications occuring during follow-up of retrospectively included patients

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at one follow-up 12-30 months after initial intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Complications leading to reintervention during follow-up of retrospectively included patients

other_outcome.measure: Demographic data of the patient: age
other_outcome.description: Retrospective documentation of Demographic data of the patient for descriptive purposes: age of patients at time of surgery

other_outcome.measure: Demographic data of the patient: sex
other_outcome.description: Retrospective documentation of Demographic data of the patient for descriptive purposes: sex

other_outcome.measure: Demographic data of the patient: weight
other_outcome.description: Retrospective documentation of Demographic data of the patient for descriptive purposes: weight and height are documented to calculate body mass index

other_outcome.measure: Demographic data of the patient: height
other_outcome.description: Retrospective documentation of Demographic data of the patient for descriptive purposes: weight and height are documented to calculate body mass index

other_outcome.measure: Demographic data of the patient: general health status
other_outcome.description: Retrospective documentation of Demographic data of the patient for descriptive purposes: general health status according to ASA classification (ASA I: healthy patient; ASA II: A patient with mild systemic disease; ASA III: A patient with severe systemic disease; ASA IV: A patient with severe systemic disease that is a constant threat to life; ASA V: A moribund patient who is not expected to survive without the operation)

other_outcome.measure: Demographic data of the patient: risk factors
other_outcome.description: Retrospective documentation of Demographic data of the patient for descriptive purposes: risk factors (smoker, alcohol abuse, previous surgery of abdominal hernia, chronic immunosuppression, chronic cortison treatment, abdominal aortic aneurysm, anticoagulantic treatment)
Retrospective documentation of surgery details for descriptive purposes: Type of intervention (elective / emergency)
Retrospective documentation of surgery details for descriptive purposes: access (open / laparoscopic / laparoscopic with conversion)
Retrospective documentation of surgery details for descriptive purposes: anesthetics (general / regional / local)
Retrospective documentation of surgery details for descriptive purposes: duration of surgery

other_outcome.measure: Surgery details: details on implanted mesh
other_outcome.description: Retrospective documentation of surgery details for descriptive purposes: details on implanted mesh (number / sizes)
Retrospective documentation of surgery details for descriptive purposes: closure technology (absorbable suture, non absorbable suture, single-knot, continuous suture, adhesives)

intervention.description: Hernioplasty is the repair of the defect using mesh patches.

study_pop.textblock: Patients operated between January 2019 - November 2020 at the Hospital Galdakao-Usansolo (Bizkaia) for abdominal wall surgery or other fascial defects and received Safil® Mesh

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients operated between January 2019 - November 2020 at the Hospital Galdakao-Usansolo (Bizkaia) for abdominal wall surgery or other fascial defects and received Safil® Mesh
Exclusion Criteria:
- No exclusion criteria have been set.
